CustomField.formula: ROUND(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_woTax__c + ROUND(IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N1/'),Negoptim__New_Tax_1__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N2/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_2__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N3/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_3__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N4/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_4__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N5/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_5__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N6/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_6__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N7/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_7__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N8/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_8__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N9/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_9__c,0) +IF(CONTAINS(Negoptim__New_NetPrice_Taxes__c, 'N10/'), Negoptim__New_Tax_10__c,0), IF( ISBLANK(TEXT(Negoptim__Assortment_BU__r.Negoptim__Tax_Rounding_Level__c)) , 4, VALUE(TEXT(Negoptim__Assortment_BU__r.Negoptim__Tax_Rounding_Level__c)))), IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Negoptim__Assortment_BU__r.Negoptim__NetPrice_Rounding_Level__c)), 4,VALUE(TEXT(Negoptim__Assortment_BU__r.Negoptim__NetPrice_Rounding_Level__c))))
CustomField.label: New NetPrice wTax
